verses.verse: רַנְּנ֣וּ <WH7442> Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> O ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> for the upright נָאוָ֥ה <WH5000> is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <WH8416> [for] praise

הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Praise לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> with harp בְּנֵ֥בֶל <WH5035> unto him with the psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <WH6218> [and] an instrument of ten strings זַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> sing לֽוֹ׃
שִֽׁירוּ־ <WH7891> Sing ל֭וֹ שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> song חָדָ֑שׁ <WH2319> unto him a new הֵיטִ֥יבוּ <WH3190> skilfully נַ֝גֵּ֗ן <WH5059> play בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> with a loud noise

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [is] right דְּבַר־ <WH1697> For the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ <WH4639> and all his works בֶּאֱמוּנָֽה׃ <WH530> [are done] in truth

אֹ֭הֵב <WH157> He loveth צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> righteousness וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> of the goodness יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> is full הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> By the word יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> were the heavens נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> made וּבְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> of them by the breath פִּ֝֗יו <WH6310> of his mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> all צְבָאָֽם׃ <WH6635> and all the host

כֹּנֵ֣ס <WH3664> He gathereth כַּ֭נֵּד <WH5067> together as an heap מֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea נֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> he layeth up בְּאֹצָר֣וֹת <WH214> in storehouses תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> the depth

יִֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> fear מֵ֭יְהוָה <WH3068> the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> Let all the earth מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <WH4480> at יָ֝ג֗וּרוּ <WH1481> stand in awe כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> let all the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <WH8398> of the world
כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ה֣וּא <WH1931> He אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For he spake וַיֶּ֑הִי <WH1961> done הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He צִ֝וָּ֗ה <WH6680> and it was [done] he commanded וַֽיַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> and it stood fast

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD הֵפִ֥יר <WH6331> to nought עֲצַת־ <WH6098> the counsel גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen הֵ֝נִ֗יא <WH5106> of none effect מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <WH4284> the devices עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> of the people

עֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> The counsel יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> standeth מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <WH4284> the thoughts לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <WH3820> of his heart לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> to all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> generations

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Blessed הַ֭גּוֹי <WH1471> [is] the nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> whose God הָעָ֓ם ׀ <WH5971> [and] the people בָּחַ֖ר <WH977> [whom] he hath chosen לְנַחֲלָ֣ה <WH5159> for his own inheritance לֽוֹ׃

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> from heaven הִבִּ֣יט <WH5027> looketh יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD רָ֝אָ֗ה <WH7200> he beholdeth אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> all the sons הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

מִֽמְּכוֹן־ <WH4349> From the place שִׁבְתּ֥וֹ <WH3427> of his habitation הִשְׁגִּ֑יחַ <WH7688> he looketh אֶ֖ל <WH413> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> upon all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
הַיֹּצֵ֣ר <WH3335> He fashioneth יַ֣חַד <WH3162> alike לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> their hearts הַ֝מֵּבִ֗ין <WH995> he considereth אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <WH4639> all their works

אֵֽין־ <WH369> else הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> There is no king נוֹשָׁ֣ע <WH3467> saved בְּרָב־ <WH7230> by the multitude חָ֑יִל <WH2428> of an host גִּ֝בּ֗וֹר <WH1368> a mighty man לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not יִנָּצֵ֥ל <WH5337> is not delivered בְּרָב־ <WH7230> by much כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> strength

שֶׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> [is] a vain thing הַ֭סּוּס <WH5483> An horse לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה <WH8668> for safety וּבְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> [any] by his great חֵ֝יל֗וֹ <WH2428> strength לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <WH4422> neither shall he deliver

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold עֵ֣ין <WH5869> Behold the eye יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> [is] upon them that fear לַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <WH3176> him upon them that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> in his mercy
לְהַצִּ֣יל <WH5337> To deliver מִמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> from death נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> their soul וּ֝לְחַיּוֹתָ֗ם <WH2421> and to keep them alive בָּרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> in famine
נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <WH5315> Our soul חִכְּתָ֣ה <WH2442> waiteth לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> for the LORD עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ <WH5828> he [is] our help וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ <WH4043> and our shield הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Him

כִּי־ <WH3588> Because ב֭וֹ יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> shall rejoice לִבֵּ֑נוּ <WH3820> For our heart כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because בְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> name קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <WH6944> in his holy בָטָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH982> in him because we have trusted
יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> Let חַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> Let thy mercy יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> as כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <WH834> we יִחַ֥לְנוּ <WH3176> be upon us according as we hope לָֽךְ׃
